resources.string: Use the Feet, Inch, and Fraction pads. If you hit the wrong number, simply clear using the "C" buttons. Additionally, the "clear" button on the input line will reset the input line.
What happens when I hit "+" or "-"?

If the input line is preceded by "+", the input line will be added to the total. If the input line is preceded by "-", the input line will be subtracted from the total. The input line will then reset to 0.
Click on the input line or final line to multiply or divide values.
Can I change operations without adding or subtracting the input line?
Sorry, pressing "+" or "-" will complete whichever operation is currently selected. Reset the input line before changing signs.
Future features include: editable history, saving values for future viewing.
Other Feet & Inch calculators require pressing "Feet", "Inches" "x/" or "/x" after each value. This calculator reduces keystrokes by removing those keys.
